# Arcade

> Arcade is an AI platform that helps developers build, deploy, and manage AI agents with secure authorization and pre-built tools for connecting to external services.

Arcade provides a comprehensive toolkit for building AI agents with access to third-party APIs. The platform handles OAuth flows, manages credentials, and provides MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers for seamless integration with AI models. Developers can use pre-built toolkits for services like Gmail, GitHub, Slack, and more, or create custom tools using the Arcade SDK.

## Getting Started

- [page](https://docs.arcade.dev/home): Learn everything about Arcade in one place.

## Agentic Development

- [Agentic Development](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/agentic-development): Accelerate development using AI IDEs with Arcade.dev documentation.

## Api Keys

- [Getting Your API Key](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/api-keys): Learn to obtain and manage your Arcade API key.

## API Reference

- [Arcade API Reference](https://docs.arcade.dev/references/api): Understand and utilize the Arcade API for development.
- [Arcade MCP (MCP Server SDK) - Python Overview](https://docs.arcade.dev/references/mcp/python/overview): Learn to build MCP servers using the Arcade MCP SDK.
- [Claude Desktop](https://docs.arcade.dev/references/mcp/python/clients/claude-desktop): Set up Arcade MCP servers with Claude Desktop efficiently.
- [Cursor IDE](https://docs.arcade.dev/references/mcp/python/clients/cursor): Integrate Arcade MCP server with Cursor IDE for development.
- [Errors](https://docs.arcade.dev/references/mcp/python/errors): Learn about domain-specific error types in MCP server.
- [MCP Inspector](https://docs.arcade.dev/references/mcp/python/clients/mcp-inspector): MCP Inspector aids in debugging and testing MCP servers.
- [Middleware](https://docs.arcade.dev/references/mcp/python/middleware): Learn to create and manage middleware for MCP requests.
- [Server](https://docs.arcade.dev/references/mcp/python/server): Learn to implement and manage the Arcade MCP Server.
- [Settings](https://docs.arcade.dev/references/mcp/python/settings): Configure global and environment-driven settings for Arcade MCP Server.
- [Sharing your MCP server](https://docs.arcade.dev/references/mcp/python/sharing): Share your MCP server securely with remote users.
- [Transport Modes](https://docs.arcade.dev/references/mcp/python/transports): Understand stdio and HTTP transport modes for MCP servers.
- [Types](https://docs.arcade.dev/references/mcp/python/types): Defines Pydantic models and enums for MCP protocol usage.
- [Visual Studio Code](https://docs.arcade.dev/references/mcp/python/clients/visual-studio-code): Integrate Arcade MCP servers with Visual Studio Code effectively.

## Arcade Cli

- [The Arcade CLI](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/arcade-cli): Learn to install and use the Arcade CLI tool.

## Auth

- [Authorized Tool Calling](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth/auth-tool-calling): Guide for securely authorizing tools in AI applications.
- [Checking Tool Authorization Status](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth/tool-auth-status): Learn to check tool authorization status and requirements.
- [Direct Third-Party API Call](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth/call-third-party-apis-directly): Learn to retrieve authorization tokens for third-party APIs.
- [How Arcade helps with Agent Authorization](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth/how-arcade-helps): Learn how Arcade simplifies agent authorization for applications.
- [How Arcade helps with Agent Authorization](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth/how-arcade-helps): Learn how Arcade enables secure agent authorization for applications.
- [Secure and Brand the Auth Flow in Production](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth/secure-auth-production): Secure and customize authentication flows for production applications.

- [Discord](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth-providers/discord): Guide to configure Discord authentication in Arcade applications.
- [Dropbox](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth-providers/dropbox): Guide to configuring Dropbox authentication in Arcade applications.
- [GitHub](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth-providers/github): Configure GitHub authentication for Arcade tools and apps.
- [Google](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth-providers/google): Configure Google authentication for Arcade applications and tools.

- [Linear](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth-providers/linear): Configure Linear authentication for API access in Arcade.
- [LinkedIn](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth-providers/linkedin): Configure LinkedIn authentication for API access in Arcade.
- [Microsoft](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth-providers/microsoft): Guide to configuring Microsoft authentication in Arcade.
- [Notion](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth-providers/notion): Configure Notion authentication for API access in Arcade.
- [OAuth 2.0](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth-providers/oauth2): Authorize tools with any OAuth 2.0-compatible provider.
- [Reddit](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth-providers/reddit): Configure Reddit authentication for your Arcade applications.
- [Salesforce](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth-providers/salesforce): Configure Salesforce authentication for API access with Arcade.
- [Slack](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth-providers/slack): Configure Slack authentication for tools and agents using Arcade.
- [Spotify](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth-providers/spotify): Guide to configuring Spotify authentication in Arcade.
- [Twitch](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth-providers/twitch): Configure Twitch authentication for Arcade applications and tools.
- [X](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth-providers/x): Guide to configuring X auth for API integration.
- [Zendesk](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth-providers/zendesk): Configure Zendesk authentication for Arcade applications.
- [Zoom](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/auth-providers/zoom): Guide to configuring Zoom authentication in Arcade applications.

## Build Tools

- [Creating an MCP Server with Arcade](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/build-tools/create-a-mcp-server): Create and deploy a custom MCP Server using Arcade.
- [RetryableToolError in Arcade](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/build-tools/retry-tools-with-improved-prompt): Learn to improve tool calls using RetryableToolError.
- [Tool Error Handling](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/build-tools/handle-tool-errors): Learn to handle errors in Arcade's Tool Development Kit.
- [Understanding `Context` and tools](https://docs.arcade.dev/home/build-tools/tool-context): Learn to use Arcade's `Context` for tool authorization.

## MCP Servers - Contribute A Server

- [How to contribute a MCP Server](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/contribute-a-server): Learn to contribute your MCP Server to Arcade documentation.

## MCP Servers - Customer Support

- [Zendesk](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/customer-support/zendesk): Manage customer support tickets and knowledge base in Zendesk.
- [Zendesk Reference](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/customer-support/zendesk/reference): Reference Zendesk enumerations for ticket status and sorting.

## MCP Servers - Databases

- [Clickhouse](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/databases/clickhouse): Interact with Clickhouse databases in a read-only manner.
- [Clickhouse](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/databases/postgres/clickhouse): Enable read-only interaction with Clickhouse databases for agents.
- [MongoDB](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/databases/mongodb): Enable read-only interactions with MongoDB databases for agents.
- [MongoDB](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/databases/postgres/mongodb): Enable read-only interactions with MongoDB databases for agents.
- [Postgres](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/databases/postgres): Enable read-only interactions with PostgreSQL databases for agents.

## MCP Servers - Development

- [E2B](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/development/e2b): Enable agents to run code in a sandboxed environment.
- [Firecrawl](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/development/firecrawl): Enable web scraping, crawling, and mapping with Firecrawl tools.
- [GitHub](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/development/github): Enable agents to interact with GitHub repositories and tools.
- [Reference for Firecrawl Toolkit](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/development/firecrawl/reference): Learn to format scraped web pages using Firecrawl Toolkit.
- [Reference for GitHub Toolkit](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/development/github/reference): Guide for sorting and filtering GitHub pull requests and repositories.

## MCP Servers - Entertainment

- [Imgflip](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/entertainment/imgflip): Create and manage memes using Imgflip API tools.
- [Imgflip](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/entertainment/spotify/imgflip): Create and manage memes using Imgflip's API tools.
- [Spotify](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/entertainment/spotify): Enable agents to interact with Spotify tracks and playback.
- [Twitch auth provider](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/entertainment/twitch): Guide to configuring Twitch authentication in Arcade.

- [BoxApi](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/productivity/box-api): Manage Box content and workflows using BoxApi tools.
- [Clickup](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/productivity/clickup): Enable agents to interact with ClickUp workspaces and tasks.
- [Clickup Reference](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/productivity/clickup/reference): Learn Clickup enumerations for task management tools.
- [Close.io](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/productivity/closeio): Learn to manage leads and deals in Close.io CRM.
- [Confluence](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/productivity/confluence): Enable agents to interact with Confluence efficiently.
- [Dropbox](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/productivity/dropbox): Enable agents to interact with Dropbox files and folders.
- [Gmail](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/productivity/gmail): Manage emails in Gmail using Arcade's pre-built tools.
- [Gmail Reference](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/productivity/gmail/reference): Provides enumerations for Gmail MCP Server tools.
- [Google Calendar](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/productivity/google-calendar): Enable agents to interact with Google Calendar effectively.
- [Google Contacts](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/productivity/google-contacts): Interact with Google Contacts to manage and search contacts.
- [Google Docs](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/productivity/google-docs): Enable agents to interact with Google Docs documents easily.
- [Google Drive](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/productivity/google-drive): Manage and access Google Drive files with integrated tools.
- [Google Sheets](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/productivity/google-sheets): Enable agents to interact with Google Sheets efficiently.
- [Google Slides](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/productivity/google-slides): Interact with Google Slides to create and manage presentations.
- [GoogleCalendar Reference](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/productivity/google-calendar/reference): Reference enumerations for Google Calendar tools and options.
- [GoogleDocs Reference](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/productivity/google-docs/reference): Reference for GoogleDocs enumerations and document formats.
- [GoogleDrive Reference](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/productivity/google-drive/reference): Reference enumerations for Google Drive MCP Server tools.
- [GoogleSheets Reference](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/productivity/google-sheets/reference): Reference Google Sheets enumerations for sorting data effectively.
- [Jira](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/productivity/jira): Integrate and manage Jira issues and projects efficiently.
- [Jira Environment Variables](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/productivity/jira/environment-variables): Configure Jira API request limits and caching settings.
- [Jira Reference](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/productivity/jira/reference): Reference for Jira enumerations and filtering options.
- [Linear](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/productivity/linear): Interact with Linear's issue tracking and team management features.
- [Notion](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/productivity/notion): Integrate and interact with Notion using Arcade's tools.
- [Obsidian](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/productivity/obsidian): Learn about the Arcade Obsidian Toolkit for MCP Sever.
- [Outlook Calendar](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/productivity/outlook-calendar): Manage Outlook Calendar events using provided API tools.
- [Outlook Mail](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/productivity/outlook-mail): Enable email management using the Outlook API tools.
- [OutlookMail Reference](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/productivity/outlook-mail/reference): Reference enumerations and filters for OutlookMail tools.
- [page](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/productivity/dropbox/reference): Defines Dropbox item categories for file organization.
- [Sharepoint](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/productivity/sharepoint): Enable agents to interact with SharePoint resources efficiently.
- [XeroApi](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/productivity/xero-api): Access and manage Xero accounting data through API tools.

## MCP Servers - Sales

- [Hubspot](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/sales/hubspot): Integrate and automate HubSpot CRM interactions for agents.
- [Hubspot Reference](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/sales/hubspot/reference): Reference Hubspot enumerations for effective tool usage.
- [Salesforce CRM](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/sales/salesforce): Guide for using Salesforce CRM with Arcade's MCP Server.

## MCP Servers - Search

- [Google Finance](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/search/google_finance): Retrieve real-time and historical stock data using Arcade.
- [Google Flights](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/search/google_flights): Search for one-way flights using Google Flights API.
- [Google Hotels](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/search/google_hotels): Search for hotels globally using the Google Hotels API.
- [Google Jobs](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/search/google_jobs): Enable agents to search job openings via Google Jobs.
- [Google Maps](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/search/google_maps): Get directions between locations using Google Maps API tools.
- [Google News](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/search/google_news): Enable agents to search news stories using Google News.
- [Google Search](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/search/google_search): Enable agents to perform Google searches using SerpAPI.
- [Google Shopping Search](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/search/google_shopping): Enable product searches on Google Shopping using Arcade tools.
- [Walmart Search](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/search/walmart): Enable product searches and details retrieval from Walmart.
- [YouTube Search](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/search/youtube): Enable agents to search and retrieve YouTube video details.

## MCP Servers - Social Communication

- [Arcade for Slack](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/social-communication/slack/install): Integrate Arcade's AI tools with your Slack workspace.
- [Arcade for Zoom](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/social-communication/zoom/install): Integrate Arcade tools with Zoom for efficient meeting management.
- [Discord](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/social-communication/discord): Guide to configuring Discord authentication with Arcade.
- [Environment Variables](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/social-communication/slack/environment-variables): Manage Slack API request limits and pagination settings.
- [LinkedIn](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/social-communication/linkedin): Enable agents to create posts on LinkedIn easily.
- [Microsoft Teams](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/social-communication/microsoft-teams): Manage and interact with Microsoft Teams effectively.
- [MicrosoftTeams Reference](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/social-communication/microsoft-teams/reference): Reference for Microsoft Teams enumerations and match types.
- [Reddit](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/social-communication/reddit): Enable agents to interact with Reddit using pre-built tools.
- [Reference](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/social-communication/slack/reference): Learn Slack MCP Server enumerations for conversation types.
- [Reference](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/social-communication/twilio/reference): Learn to integrate Twilio for SMS and WhatsApp messaging.
- [Slack](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/social-communication/slack): Enable agents to interact with Slack for efficient communication.
- [SlackApi](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/social-communication/slack_api): Enable agents to manage and automate Slack workspace interactions.
- [SlackApi](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/social-communication/slack-api): Enable Slack workspace management and automation through API tools.
- [Teams Reference](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/social-communication/teams/reference): Reference for Teams MCP Server enumerations and match types.
- [Twilio](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/social-communication/twilio): Send SMS and WhatsApp messages easily using Twilio.
- [X (formerly Twitter)](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/social-communication/x): Enable agents to interact with X (formerly Twitter) easily.
- [Zoom](https://docs.arcade.dev/mcp-servers/social-communication/zoom): Enable agents to interact with Zoom for meeting management.
